entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
